title: The Power of Meditation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/5/20
itunes:title: The Power of Meditation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/5/20
description:
George Noory and author Bill Douglas explore his research into the healing qualities of meditation, how it can lower stress in everyday life, and even impact the global consciousness.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
